author: Anne Gearan
title: Trump announces cutoff of new funding for the World Health Organization over pandemic response
description: The president and conservative allies have accused the U.N. agency of catering to China and slowing global response to the pandemic.
content:
We have not been treated properly, Trump said, as he announced a suspension period of 60- to 90 days for U.S. funding.
Conservative allies of the president have begun focusing on the WHO as complicit in a Chinese coverup of the outbreak in late 2019 and earl… [+4294 chars]
